info.name: MidnightZap
info.description:
Ad free, all black background with light gray links and cyan text.  I've sized the font for a screen resolution of 800x600 pixels.  If you've got a larger screen resolution just use your browser controls to increase the text size...  

Your favorite shows are styled with a maroon background  ~ sports with dark purple ~ movies with dark navy ~ news with a dark gray ~ & kid's shows with a hunter green background...

>>> A special thanks to Webb from which this style started from... :)

Cheers!

You can find me on Twitter: @EPrint_Pro
Or reach me through my company, EPrint Promotions: http://www.EPrintPro.net
info.additionalInfo:
A few little finishing touches included centering the text within the boxes so it stands out a little from adjacent boxes - as well as putting in the "crosshair" cursor to indicate the in-page links - plus - you can skip to the next few hours forward and back without scrolling up or down to find the link - i've made the links stay with you as you scroll - look for the arrows pointing left and right at the bottom of your browser window...

UPDATE - 12/27-2008 - 
Removed advertisements from in-page links.
Restyled drop-down menu and search submit button.
Reinserted/Resized images for the 3 hour earlier and later links.  I've also positioned these links to the browser window so that they are still available when you scroll downwards.
UPDATE - 03/01-2009 - 
Applied the "display: none" attribute to the img (doubleclick advertisement) tag - I'll keep an eye on this in case they change it on me...

Updated the genre favorites tags in accordance with changes made by zap2it.com.
